subject: Football (College)
Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: North Carolina will vacate all 16 football victories from the 2008 and 2009 seasons and reduce scholarships as part of self-imposed penalties after an N.C.A.A. investigation.
snippet: North Carolina will vacate all 16 football victories from the 2008 and 2009 seasons and reduce scholarships as part of self-imposed penalties after an N.C.A.A. investigation.
